duties_responsibilities.duty: Safe operation of heavy equipment including wheel loader, haul trucks, scrapers, water truck, skid steer, back hoe, and drill.
Perform preventive maintenance on heavy equipment, fueling, logging, and reporting any issues found during inspections.
Plant utility tasks such as clean-up, shipping/loading, and equipment inspections.
Adherence to safety policies and procedures, attending safety meetings, and maintaining a clean and safe work environment.
Following directions for quality control, reporting deviations, and adhering to guidelines and regulations.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED equivalent.
